body: If were the office guy, I would have told her straight up "fuck off!" and just leave her damn ass at the train station.
Are there any other hentai like this? This is the best one I've ever read by a mile

i really love this series. it's fun reading about her tragic destructive feminine beauty. it not only burned out any empathy she could possibly have for another person, but it also completely blurred other people's morals and standards. it's strange seeing a story where everyone deserved all the bad things that happened to them.
Am I the only one who thinks this author could make wonderful romance stories? They are so talented at setting up something beautiful, but each time it gets ruined.
I loved this! But she is such a bitch! I hate her for ruining the teacher's life, the other two guys deserved it, I really need the next chapter!!! :O

This office kid really is garbage. He even knew he should've left her yet he still let himself get played like the tool he is. I especially hated him when he took it out on the boss and talked about his daughter, I would've shanked the bitch for bringing her up.

Anyway, I honestly like this more than most non-hentai manga I read.. Haha! How often does this get updated?

At first I thought she's a poor girl no she was a bitch from the start
I know she ruined the teacher but rape is not an opinion just stay away
from these kind of girls  that is all anyway she's so cute & sexy so bangble
I understand why the teacher hate her but I don't agree with rape as punishment and revenge. Now the other guys are fucking assholes, I hope they have painful deaths.
the teacher arc was good and you can understand why he hate her but this guy is just a beta with bad luck
